name: Stripe [CREDIT]
description: Web and mobile payments, built for developers. Waived transaction fees on first $1,000 in revenue processed available via Github Student Developer Pack.

name: Mapbox [CREDIT]
description: A mapping platform for developers. 5 GB of storage for your own custom data.

name: Autodesk Software [FREE]
description: The Free Autodesk Education License includes Autodesk Maya, 3DS MAX, Softimage, Motion Builder, Mudbox, Inventor Professional...

name: Deepnote [FREE]
description: The best way to collaborate with others on data science projects. Education plan allows you to create an unlimited amount of Deepnote teams and work with any number of collaborators.
